original_title: The Sermons of Sister Jane: Believing the Unbelievable
overview: When Sister Jane Kelly discovers sexual molestation and thievery, she carries her battle all the way to Rome creating a scandal; this leads her to debunk church teachings on birth control, homosexuality, married priests and virgin birth and become a champion for the poor. Her courage, wit and humanity shine throughout the film.
title: The Sermons of Sister Jane: Believing the Unbelievable
